body:
Added some gifs for reference for D2K.

|![d2k_sonictank_1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20945684/36075914-75301bb4-0f55-11e8-9156-6bcfe5700d65.gif)|![d2k_sonictank_2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20945684/36075915-754c7f52-0f55-11e8-8e19-e313aef6cda0.gif)|
|:--:|:--:|


For the first gif I also zipped the `GIMP`-Project file for further pixel-peeping, maybe it helps somebody: [D2K_SonicTank_1_gif.zip](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/files/1714615/D2K_SonicTank_1_gif.zip)

I selected some parts of the first gif and played amateurish with the Layer modes of GIMP with the following results, which don't tell me much.

|![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20945684/36076085-0b9af37e-0f58-11e8-8b52-a74e8a80a38f.png)|![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20945684/36076088-16c0375a-0f58-11e8-94b3-0907e900d14a.png)|
|:---:|:----:|
|Difference Mode|Grain extract mode|

IRC user Guest91948 noted (summarized):

```
<Guest91948> from the gif it look more like a magnifing glass effect, ratio 20:21 or 20:19
<Guest91948> it zoom in
<Guest91948> rocks look bigger where is sonic tank zap
<Guest91948> I looked the gif in gimp. it is definitively a zoom in magnifing glass effect. sonic tank antenna is bigger in frame 14 circle shape than in frame 0 background
<Guest91948> frame 46 is the last frame with sonic zap
<Guest91948> and frame 14 is the first frame with sonic zap
<Guest91948> only frame 14 and 46 have the circle shape with high zoom in, all other in the middle have 2 circles shapes with less zoom in
```
